alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Shiawassee and southwestern Genesee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morrice, or near Perry, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bancroft around 450 PM EDT. Byron around 455 PM EDT. Durand and Gaines around 500 PM EDT. Lennon around 505 PM EDT. Swartz Creek around 510 PM EDT. Flushing around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Shaftsburg and Vernon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
